1.title: Poor Radio Reception
1.description: Indicates poor radio signal reception during communication.

1.title: Good Radio Reception
1.description: Indicates clear and good radio signal reception.

1.title: Stop Transmission
1.description: Request to immediately cease all radio transmissions.

1.title: Message Received
1.description: Confirmation that a message has been successfully received.

1.title: Relay Message
1.description: Request to pass a message to another party or unit.

1.title: Change Radio Channel
1.description: Instruction to switch to a different radio frequency or channel.

1.title: Out of Service
1.description: Indicates that the unit is currently unavailable for service.

1.title: In Service
1.description: Indicates that the unit is available and ready for service.

1.title: Repeat Message
1.description: Request to repeat a previously transmitted message.

1.title: Return or Go to ___
1.description: Instruction for a unit to return to or proceed to a specified location.

1.title: Location
1.description: Request or provision of the current location of a unit.

1.title: Cancel or Disregard
1.description: Instruction to cancel a previous order or disregard a message.

1.title: Stand-By
1.description: Request for a unit to wait or hold their position temporarily.

1.title: Do You Have Contact With ___?
1.description: Inquiry to check if contact has been established with a specified unit or person.

1.title: Clear of Warrants
1.description: Confirmation that a person or unit is free of any outstanding warrants.

1.title: Subject Wanted
1.description: Indicates that a subject is wanted by law enforcement.

1.title: Registration Check
1.description: Request to check the registration status of a vehicle.

1.title: Check for Warrants
1.description: Request to verify if a person has any outstanding warrants.

1.title: Time Check
1.description: Request for the current time from the dispatcher or control.

1.title: Correct Time
1.description: Response providing the accurate current time.

1.title: Please Identify Your Unit
1.description: Request for a unit to identify itself with its call sign or number.

1.title: Can ___ Come to Radio?
1.description: Request for a specified person to come to the radio for communication.

1.title: Available for Phone Call?
1.description: Inquiry to check if a unit is available for a phone call.

1.title: Ambulance Needed
1.description: Request for an ambulance due to a medical emergency.

1.title: Person Down
1.description: Report of an individual who has collapsed or is incapacitated.

1.title: Possible Body
1.description: Indication of a potential deceased person at the scene.

1.title: Coroner's Case
1.description: Situation requiring the coroner's involvement, typically a death.

1.title: Suicide (a) Attempted
1.description: Report of a suicide attempt or completed suicide.

1.title: Security Check
1.description: Request to perform a security check on a location or area.

1.title: Shots Fired
1.description: Report of gunfire or shots being fired in the area.

1.title: How Do You Copy?
1.description: Inquiry to check the clarity or reception of the radio communication.

1.title: Hazard
1.description: Report of a hazardous situation or condition requiring attention.

1.title: Bike Theft
1.description: Report of a bicycle being stolen.

1.title: Prepare to Copy
1.description: Instruction to get ready to receive and record information.

1.title: Explosion
1.description: Report of an explosion occurring at the scene.

1.title: Arrived at Scene
1.description: Confirmation that a unit has reached the location of an incident.

1.title: Completed Assignment
1.description: Indication that a assigned task or call has been completed.

1.title: Prisoner in Custody
1.description: Report that a prisoner is currently in custody.

1.title: Pick Up
1.description: Instruction to pick up a person, item, or evidence.

1.title: Alarm is Sounding
1.description: Report of an activated alarm at a location.

1.title: Drugged
1.description: Report of an individual under the influence of drugs.

1.title: Drunk
1.description: Report of an individual who is intoxicated by alcohol.

1.title: Suspicious Person
1.description: Report of a person behaving suspiciously.

1.title: Person Calling for Help
1.description: Report of an individual requesting assistance.

1.title: Any Traffic for Me?
1.description: Inquiry to check if there are any messages or calls for the unit.

1.title: Provide Cover for Units
1.description: Instruction to provide backup or support to other units.

1.title: Prowler
1.description: Report of a suspicious person lurking or trespassing.

1.title: Visitors Can Hear Radio
1.description: Warning that visitors can overhear radio communications

1.title: Advise Weather / Road Conditions
1.description: Request for an update on weather or road conditions

1.title: Getting Fuel
1.description: Notification that a unit is refueling

1.title: Available?
1.description: Inquiry about the availability of a unit

1.title: Proceeding to ___
1.description: Indication that a unit is proceeding to a specified location

1.title: Suspicious Person
1.description: Report of a suspicious person

1.title: Provide Cover for Units
1.description: Request to provide cover specifically for other units
